detaileddescription.para: Creates the Data Sequence tripal pane and the table within that pane.

parameterdescription.para: Machine name of bundle, example bio_data_1
Array of the machine names of the children of the field group being created.

detaileddescription.para: Creates the Properties Table tripal pane and the table within that pane.

parameterdescription.para: Machine name of bundle, example bio_data_1
Array of the machine names of the children of the field group being created.

detaileddescription.para: Creates the tripal panes for Publications..

parameterdescription.para: Machine name of bundle, example bio_data_1
Array of the machine names of the children of the field group being created.

detaileddescription.para: Creates the Summary tripal pane and the table within that pane.

parameterdescription.para: Machine name of bundle, example bio_data_1
Array of the machine names of the children of the field group being created.

detaileddescription.para: Processes all fields other than those that belong in the summary table, property table, or data sequence table.

parameterdescription.para: Machine name of bundle, example bio_data_1
Human readable name of the field.
Machine name of the child element.
